Label.en: I mean... just look at the effort that went into constructing it!
Label.fr: Quand on pense à tous ces efforts pour la construire !
Label.es: I mean... just look at the effort that went into constructing it!
Label.zh: I mean... just look at the effort that went into constructing it!

Label.en: That said... it was built remarkably efficiently and safely for that time...
Label.fr: Cependant elle a été contruite avec une efficacité et un niveau de sécurité rares pour l'époque
Label.es: That said... it was built remarkably efficiently and safely for that time...
Label.zh: That said... it was built remarkably efficiently and safely for that time...

Label.en: only one worked died throughout the whole process... which was unheard of then
Label.fr: seul un ouvrier est mort durant la construction...remarquable pour l'époque
Label.es: only one worked died throughout the whole process... which was unheard of then
Label.zh: only one worked died throughout the whole process... which was unheard of then
